name: Hygge Aura Generator Quiz
description:
Discover precisely how Hygge you are in this simulated aura detection session.
By answering 10 simple questions, interpolated by the trendiest Pinterest posts and by Denmark's official tourist campaigns, you'll visualise your inner Hygge aura!

Developed and designed by Francesca Tremulo and Simone Cibrario Nona

Disclaimer:

The game sad been developed in the context of a critical design class. The perspective on Hygge is from two expats adapting to living in Denmark. The quiz isn't meant to define what Hygge is. The purpose is to highlight the contrast between the commercial aesthetics of Hygge and the realities of living in Copenhagen.
